titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital losses applicable to individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 107-734.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 458.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Reported to House amended. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase, from $3,000 to $8,250, the annual capital loss limit applicable to individuals. Provides for an annual inflation adjustment.
